name: DocuXplorer
tag_list: document-management-software, document-organization-application, document-management-solution, document-archive-software, small-business-document-management, electronic-document-management, paperless-document-management
overview:
DocuXplorer is an industry leading document management software provider. With both a desktop application and a cloud-based web client available in English, Spanish, and Arabic, DocuXplorer strives to improve organization and efficiency of small businesses by offering a robust, full-feature document management solution that is both user-friendly and affordable.

In addition to their DocuXplorer document managment software, the company also offers document managment consulting services including taxonomy consulting, cloud hosting, document security, and document backup services. DocuXplorer has offices in North America and South America, allowing them to provide expert document management consulting globally.
